jobTitle: Cloud Developer | Deloitte Technology Delivery Center
jobDescription: About the job Description & Requirements  Who we are looking for  You have a good understanding of the GOLANG or Python, and you have a good understanding of software architecture, microservices, and software containerization, and you can work with a high degree of autonomy in the GOLANG/Python serverless ecosystem; Some experience with Java/NodeJS/Kotlin/Scala or the willingness to learn if needed is an advantage;  You can take on development tasks of small/medium/high complexity with limited support;  You can follow standard coding practices, contribute to code review, and follow up on merge actions; You have previously worked with unit tests or automation testing frameworks, or you are familiar with them;  You understand the importance of unit tests, code quality, and security checks, and you integrate them into daily activities; You are familiar with build tools;  You have used a source control versioning mechanism – Git/SVN and you are comfortable working with it; You had some exposure to any public/private cloud providers (preferably AWS/GCP/Azure) and you are interested in learning more about how projects are run on cloud platforms; You are aware of modern virtualization solutions such as Docker, Kubernetes, etc.;  You know the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases and are comfortable working with either of them.  Nice to have: Kubernetes administration skills; Nice to have: Terraform hands-on experience.  Your future role  In a highly collaborative consulting role, your work won’t be just another piece of the puzzle – you’ll be contributing and having visibility from concept and design to testing and deployment. We provide the opportunity to partner with iconic brands, leading work streams to solve some of the most exciting problems for our clients.  What we offer  Fast-paced working environment within geographically distributed teams;  Greenfield projects! Opportunity to contribute to high-volume web-facing containerized applications;  Manage, provision, and version cloud environments leveraging Infrastructure as Code (IaC);  Exposure to a wide variety of cutting-edge technologies and frameworks. We run a lot of projects on different tech setups, meaning there is always a new challenge for you if you choose to take it; Chance to get involved and drive prototype projects (Mobile apps, IoT stuff, etc.) as part of the Deloitte Digital Developers community;  Trainings! We encourage you to attend as many as possible and conduct some to help your colleagues grow while developing your soft skills;  Opportunities for growth both from a tech perspective and from the soft skills perspective.   About Deloitte  Deloitte is a variety of people, experience, industries, and services we deliver in 150 countries of the world. It is an intellectual challenge, a good starting point for your career, and an excellent opportunity for continuous development and gaining valuable life experiences. What you only must do is to take the first step – press the apply button and send us your CV, go through all the stages of the recruitment process, and sign a contract with us. Deloitte is simply your best choice.  About the team  Deloitte is a variety of people, experience, industries, and services we deliver in 150 countries of the world. It is an intellectual challenge, a good starting point for your career, and an excellent opportunity for continuous development and gaining valuable life experiences. What you only must do is to take the first step – press the apply button and send us your CV, go through all the stages of the recruitment process, and sign a contract with us. Deloitte is simply your best choice.
